TOBW(6D)                                               TOBW(6D)





NAME
       tobw - convert a color image to black and white

SYNOPSIS
       tobw colorimage bwimage

DESCRIPTION
       tobw  converts  a  stored color image to black and white
       and saves it. The color file must already exist as  col-
       orimage; the black and white file will be named bwimage.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                  TOBW(6D)
